long_description: with snappy Shimano 105 components and a smooth carbon fork, the Diamondback Steilacoom RCX bike is right at home on wet, muddy 'cross courses, off-the-beaten-path adventures or daily commutes. Full-carbon fork with tapered 1.5 in. steerer reduces weight while maintaining strength, enhancing front-end stiffness and ensuring responsive handling. Shimano 105 derailleurs and shifters supply precise, fast shifts across the 20 gear options so you're in the right gear when you need it. Fully butted 7005 aluminum frame delivers a light, stiff and responsive platform; formed top tube features a flat bottom to make it easy to carry the bike on your shoulder. BB30 bottom bracket shell design increases stiffness and improves power transfer. FSA Gossamer PRO Cross crankset pairs with a 12-27 cassette for great 'cross gearing, whether you'r sprinting for the line or slogging it through the sand. Tektro cantilever brakes deliver confident stopping power and plenty of mud clearance. Specs on the Diamondback Steilacoom RCX cyclocross bike are subject to change.
short_description: with snappy Shimano 105 components and a smooth carbon fork, the Diamondback Steilacoom RCX bike is right at home on wet, muddy 'cross courses, off-the-beaten-path adventures or daily commutes.
